name: D - Nicole Death
_source: speak;Nicole; That was{tgm}...{tgm} plumb stupid of me{tgm}...
speak;Carson; Nicole!{w} I'll get you out of there!
speak;Nicole; I-it might be a touch too late for me, darlin'{tgm}...
speak;Carson; Don't say that!{w} You have to live!{w} You{tgm}...{tgm}have to{tgm}...
speak;Nicole; I'll{tgm}...{tgm}try to hang on, then, Carson.{w} Can't{tgm}...{tgm}be leavin' you alone just yet, I suppose{tgm}...
